apdOverview.programOverview:
APD 1; This APD has missing fields for Admin check, the missing fields are in the State Expenses and Other Funding of the First activity.

  • FFY 2022-2024
  • 2 Key State Personnel
  • 3 Activities
    • Activity 1
      • Funding Source: HIT
      • NO Standards and Conditions
      • 1 Outcome
      • 1 Milestone
      • 1 State Staff
      • NO State Expenses
      • 1 Private Contractor Costs
      • NO other funding
    • Activity 2
      • Funding Source: HIE
      • 1 Outcome
      • 1 Milestone
      • 1 State Staff
      • 3 State Expenses
      • 1 Private Contractor Costs
      • Include other funding
    • Activity 3
      • Funding Source: HIT
      • 1 Outcome
      • 1 Milestone
      • 1 State Staff
      • 2 State Expenses
      • 1 Private Contractor Costs
      • Include other funding
